Package de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio

Class NioClientNetworkLayer

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio.NioNetworkLayer
de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio.NioClientNetworkLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNetworkLayer
public class NioClientNetworkLayer
extends NioNetworkLayer
implements ClientNetworkLayer
Network layer implementation for ClientNetworkManagers which are using NetworkLayerType.NIO.
Author:
Matthias Wagner
